post.title: Tech Enthusiast And Women’s Advocate Simi Olusola Set To Run For Ekiti State House Of Assembly
post.excerpt: Simi Olusola is a leading tech enthusiast and founder of Aspilos Foundation, a youth-led non-profit organisation that uses technology to push for digital inclusion, economic growth and good governance.
post.content:
Simi Olusola is a leading tech enthusiast and founder of Aspilos Foundation, a youth-led non-profit organisation that uses technology to push for digital inclusion, economic growth and good governance.

She is the official PDP candidate running for a position in the Ekiti State House of Assembly with aims to represent Ikere II constituency.

Education and Career

She has a Bachelors’ degree in Physiology from the University of Ibadan and a certificate in Social Sector Management from Lagos Business School.

In addition to the above, she has a master’s degree in data, Economics and Development Policy from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

A leading voice for women in the Nigerian tech space, Ms Olusola has served as a Strategy Advisor for women-led tech organisations like TechHerNG. Between 2016 and 2017, she was a LEAP Africa Social Innovators Fellow. She has also been a State Team Lead for anti-rape organisations like Stand To End Rape.

In addition to running Aspilos Foundation, she is a consultant and runs Nuach Consulting, which helps startups in the areas of Strategy, IT and Human Capital Development.

Campaign

In May, Document Women reported Ms Olusola’s win at the polls, securing the People’s Democratic Party’s ticket to represent Ikere II at the Ekiti State House of Assembly by winning 74 per cent of the votes.

node.title: Rose-Margaret Ekeng-Itua has become the first black woman to hold a PhD in Cybernetics
node.excerpt: An award-winning Nigerian Professor, Rose-Margaret Ekeng-Itua, has emerged as the first black woman in the world to earn a doctorate (PhD) in Cybernetics, which is the scientific study of control and communication in animals and machines, concerned with understanding complex systems like learning, cognition, adaptation, emergence, communication, and efficiency. node.title: Tech Sales vs Business Development
node.excerpt: Tech sales and Business development are important for generating revenue for companies in the tech industry. While both of them play the same role of contributing to the company’s growth, they do it in a different way and timeframe. Tech sales focus on closing deals with different customers, while business development creates new business opportunities […]
